vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βήρυλλος, ἡ,
gem of sea-green colour, beryl, [LXX+2nd c.AD+]; β. λίθος [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—diminutive βηρύλλιον, τό, [LXX+1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: beryl, a semi-precious stone of sea-green color
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
beryl, a semi-precious stone of sea-green color
a beryl, a precious stone of a sea-green color, found chiefly in India, Rev. 21:20*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: berilo (una piedra semi-preciosa, generalmente de color verde o verde azulado)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: beryl, ngọc thủy thương ; bích ngọc.
